mention.text: Kyoushirou Mibu , a skilled and noble warrior in possession of the unique powers of the Mibu Clan
the thousand-man slayer , with eyes and hair the color of blood , `` Demon Eyes '' Kyou
Kyou , whose mind has been trapped inside of Kyoushirou 's body ever since that fateful battle
a gun-wielding bounty hunter by the name of Yuya Shiina
